articles.title: MDH Faced US Rejections Before Being Suspended In Hong Kong: Report - NDTV
articles.description: Popular Indian spice brand MDH, under scrutiny for alleged contamination in some products, has since 2021 seen an average 14.5 per cent of its US shipments rejected due to the presence of bacteria, a Reuters analysis of US regulatory data found.
